Dear:

Upon reviewing the status of your order, we found that your order has been delivered within 10 minutes after we sent a friend request to you, the reason why are they changing accounts is because they have many stock on different account, they were collecting for you, sorry for the inconvenience.

Discord : iggm_
Email : Fixcomplaint@iggm.com

My manager will do her best to help you solve the problem.

Regards,
IGGM

reviews.text: Easy to work with and great product.
reviews.title: Easy to work with and great product.

reviews.text:
I contacted Flasbay.com in South Africa via email.
Throughout the correspondence it became more and more evident that the account manager who responded had never read nor understood my requirement, after 5 emails back and forth I called him to explain my request as his responses never answered my question , just to find out that he sits in Hong Kong and that the company is not able to accommodate my printing request. Total waste of time and misleading. Stuff gets produced in CHINA
reviews.title: ignorant sales people, waste of time

reviews.text: To make a payment on the website is difficult. But the prices were fair and good customer support.
reviews.title: To make a payment on the website is…

reviews.text: Sales associate was great. Items were great. Workmanship was fantastic.
reviews.title: Sales associate was great

reply.message:
Hello Karen,
We are glad you had an excellent experience working with us.
We look forward to working with you next time!
-Flashbay Management

reviews.text: This was my first time ordering products from Flashbay and the customer service was great. They were always responsive and helped make sure our artwork was done right. I was always given an accurate timeline and my order arrived exactly when they said it would. We loved our product! Thank you Justin Bamberg for making the whole process as easy as possible.
reviews.title: This was my first time ordering…

reply.message:
Hello Carina,
This is what we love to hear!
It’s great to hear that Justin was able to answer all of your questions, and you are happy with the final product.
We truly appreciate your support and can’t wait for the opportunity to serve you again.
-Flashbay Management

reviews.text: The products we ordered from Flashbay were of very high quality. I was very pleased with the order. I was able to request samples before my purchase, and this helped me to be sure of the product I was preparing to order. They were an absolute pleasure to work with, and reached out to me every step of the way. Our sales representative was extremely friendly and responsive to any and all questions. I was quite surprised with how quickly our order arrived! We are definitely going to do business with them again in the future. I highly recommend Flashbay.
reviews.title: Amazing products and service

reply.message:
Hello Robyn,
Thank you for your kind words!
We are glad you had an excellent experience working with us and are happy with your final product.
We look forward to working with you next time!
-Flashbay Management

reviews.text: I cannot recommend Flashbay highly enough. Their customer service team were prompt, professional, and courteous, with swift responses to quotation requests. Our items were dispatched quickly and are of excellent quality. We will certainly use Flashbay again for future promotional materials.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: I’m delighted with my purchase from Flashbay! The customized umbrellas turned out exactly as I imagined - the design was clear, the printed logo looked professional, and the material felt durable. The ordering process was very smooth, and the Sales Account Manager, Katrina Thompson, was attentive and pleasant.  The delivery arrived earlier than expected. AltoPeak is an excellent product for both personal use and as a gift. I’ve already received compliments on how unique and stylish the umbrellas look. Definitely worth the purchase!
reviews.title: I’m delighted with my purchase from Flashbay.
